subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit testing of web services
msgSnippet: ... You haven t been in this mailing list very long, have you? :) Are you saying the search engines gave you /nothing/? or perhaps is there a more specific
messageBody:
vkv3056 wrote:

> Thanks for your response. But you could have safely assumed that
> anyone asking for use of Junit for web services would necessarily
> have common sense of using any of the major search engines. Instead
> of sermons on helping me exercise search engine skills, some
> concrete info would have been more useful (for example, look at
> other responses on this topic).

You haven't been in this mailing list very long, have you? :)

Are you saying the search engines gave you /nothing/? or perhaps is
there a more specific question you could ask?
